subSubSection.paragraph: China (Guizhou, Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Hunan); Italy, Japan, South Korea, Thailand and the United States (quarantine) ( Talamas et al. 2017 Sabbatini Peverieri et al. 2018 )
Host associations. This species was reared from the eggs of some unidentified species of Pentatomidae in China.
